short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bottomline's solution helps protect organizations from fraudulent activity

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bottomline Monitoring Extension is part of Bottomlineâ€™s Record and Replay solution, allowing organizations to record the activity of their internal and external users in applications, to help prevent internal fraud. The system reconstructs user sessions allowing fraud investigators, security officers and internal auditors to visually replay user sessions screen by screen. Bottomline strives to gain protection and peace of mind with fraud prevention solutions for financial institutions.
